index_page.text.slogan:
This private ads
and announcement of the companies on sale.
index_page.text.tags: Placing the announcement of the sale of goods in your native language
index_page.text.footer: On the Board of free announcements CBAY.COM.CY sell and buy a variety of goods. Houses and apartments, Parking lots and garages, land and villas, motorcycles and cars, household appliances and furniture, electronics, laptops and computers, cameras and phones, shoes and clothes, cats and dogs, magazines and books, bicycles, boats, villas, musical instruments and much more.

advert.tooltip.password: Enter the password to login to your account and manage your ads (not less than :num characters)
advert.tooltip.name: How to address to you?
advert.tooltip.email: Your e-mail address will not be visible to other users, you will use this e-mail address to log on to the website
advert.tooltip.phone: You can enter multiple numbers separated by commas
advert.tooltip.allow_mails: Select this checkbox if you do not want to receive feedback on your ad to your e-mail.
advert.tooltip.title: Type a descriptive and detailed title to draw attention to the ad. Do not write in the name of price and contact information and do not use the word “sell”.
advert.tooltip.description: Please describe Your product or service, in order to avoid unnecessary questions. Do not specify in the description, telephone, e-mail, links to websites - there are separate fields.
advert.tooltip.keywords: Enter keywords separated by commas, as precise as possible in describing Your announcement
advert.tooltip.amount:
THIS FIELD IS REQUIRED!
establish reasonable and not overpriced, look at how much similar products. Cheap goods are sold much faster.
advert.tooltip.language: Select the language in which you want your ad
advert.tooltip.images: Add a good, quality pictures that will attract more attention. Hold “Ctrl” to download some photos.

profile_page.delete.title: Deleting a profile
profile_page.delete.text: If You click on the button "Delete my account", then Your account and all Your ads will be deleted. To restore the account and the ads will be impossible. Re-registration and submission of ads on Your current e-mail is also possible.
profile_page.changeemail.title: Enter Your new E-mail
profile_page.changeemail.text.info:
If You really want to change the email address, enter Your new e-mail and click on "Change address".

To this address will be sent an email containing a link, clicking on which You confirm changing e-mail.
profile_page.changeemail.text.refer: The link need to confirm that your e-mail really belong to you.
